document_data.name: ''Door of visions''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Doors of visions''''' were [[dweomered door]] that would cause any creature that passed through it to see a distinct image, as per the spell ''[[silent image]]''. The choice and design of the image was determined when the door itself was constructed.
document_data.Creation: These doors were created with a casting of ''silent image''.
